entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 5:42 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:42 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:42 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
